document.full_text: no evidence of specific or imminent threats has emerged yet from material confiscated from osama bin laden's pakistani hideout, western counter-terrorism officials said, raising questions about how directly he was in control of al qaeda.
document.title: bin laden cache reveals no evidence of imminent threats
lines_and_colors: no evidence of specific or imminent threats has emerged yet from material confiscated from osama bin laden's pakistani hideout, western counter-terrorism officials said, raising questions about how directly he was in control of al qaeda.
